client_id.title: Client id
client_id.description: Your Pinterest client id. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

client_secret.title: Client secret
client_secret.description: Your Pinterest client secret. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

refresh_token.title: Refresh token
refresh_token.description: Your Pinterest refresh token. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

access_token.title: Access token
access_token.description: Your Pinterest access token. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: A date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

window_in_days.title: Data fetch window size in days
window_in_days.description: How many days to fetch data for at once, beginning from the Start Date. The bigger the value - the faster the fetch. Minimum value is 1, Maximum is 185.
